@ fittball

It's a French movie, not English hence the French audio.
The video quality is good (not great but good). Embedded subs for the French dialogue would have been great but I will deal with the soft subs. Thank you uploader.

What's wrong with soft subs ? Anyone with a clue can use them, when hardcoded subs can not be removed.
Why waste storage with movies with hardcoded subs: one full movie per sub ?

Thanks to VLiS for *not* embedding subtitles!
